plays.text: Penalty to Mats Sundin 2 minutes for Hooking Zdeno Chara
Goal scored by Mike Fisher assisted by Chris Phillips and Magnus Arvedson
Penalty to Mikael Renberg 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Anton Volchenkov 2 minutes for Elbowing Tie Domi
Penalty to Mats Sundin 2 minutes for Holding Magnus Arvedson
Penalty to Chris Phillips 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Mats Sundin
Goal scored by Peter Schaefer assisted by Marian Hossa and Radek Bonk
Penalty to Nikolai Antropov 2 minutes for Elbowing Anton Volchenkov
Penalty to Chris Phillips 2 minutes for Holding Nikolai Antropov
Penalty to Alyn McCauley 2 minutes for Hooking Marian Hossa
Penalty to Wade Belak 2 minutes for High Sticking Petr Schastlivy
Penalty to Todd White 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Mikael Renberg
Penalty to Jonas Hoglund 2 minutes for Hooking Chris Neil
Penalty to Todd White 2 minutes for Tripping Wade Belak
Penalty to Jyrki Lumme 2 minutes for Hooking Martin Havlat
